name: William H A'Court
notes: Fromthe 1871  for St Mary Redcliff/Bristol I see that Silas and Ann  had a daughter Mary and three sons, Albert, William and my grandfather, Charles Edward.  I have no information beyond that.  Thanks for any help.  Betty Jones  Solana Beach, Cali

censusRecords.place: Bristol, St Mary Redcliff, 3 Arch Place
